attributes.description:
one owner from new !!! one owner for 21 years!! Let that sink in.
In BMW language its the holy grail. It means it was loved, cherished and respected. Its original, its a 5 speed manual and it has, naturally, its service history to support the fact that it covered less than 6000kms per year from new. 
In a world of spiralling prices and diminishing quality in modern cars, the question needs to be asked why we arent all driving cars such as this, inexpensive to buy, a plethora of BMW independent specialists to support you and parts aplenty?? Lets not even mention how everyday drivable it is, how well built it is, how involving the experience is. Highly recommended.
